remarks: The square of the norm is the norm of an inner product in a normed pre-Hilbert space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
statement:
nmsq.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
nmsq.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
nmsq.n $e |- N = ( norm ` W ) $.
nmsq $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ A e. V ) -> ( ( N ` A ) ^ 2 ) = ( A ., A ) ) $.
